about_the_game:
Have you ever dreamed of meeting a character from the virtual world?
Now is your chance! Rococo, a girl trapped in the virtual world, is sending out a distress signal to you.
She longs to escape her digital cage and live with you in the real world.
However, saving her is no easy task.

An exhilarating adventure is about to unfold:

  • Uncover the Truth Behind School Bullying: Piece together the truth about the school bullying incident by gathering clues scattered throughout the scenes. This is the key to saving Rococo.

  • Battle Malice-Born Monsters: In the darkness lurk monsters born from malice, and they will stop at nothing to stand in your way.

  • Confront Rococo's Multiple Personalities: Kind, evil, cunning—you must find the true Rococo among her many personas.

Game Features:

  • Captivating Storyline: A thrilling narrative full of twists and turns will immerse you completely.

  • Rich Interactive Experience: Interact with Rococo and objects in the environment to collect clues and solve puzzles.

  • Unique Character Design: Each character boasts a distinct personality, offering an unforgettable gaming experience.

  • Unexpected Endings: Your choices will determine Rococo's fate and the direction of the entire story.

However, things are not so simple...

In the real world, Rococo, who was rejected after confessing her feelings, discovers a game that allows her to kill at will. She sets the boy she likes as a character in the game, sinking into an endless cycle of exploitation and venting. The line between the virtual and real worlds begins to blur, and Rococo's mind starts to twist...

Can you successfully save Rococo and pull her back from the abyss of both virtual and reality?

Everything is in your hands!

name: Help Rococo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 4460 or Core™ i3 9100F or AMD FX™-6300 or Ryzen™ 3 3200G
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 或 Core™ i3 8350 or Core™ i3 9350F or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X or Ryzen™ 5 3400G
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Rococo, who was rejected for confessing in reality, discovered a game where she could kill people at will. After setting her favorite boy as a game character, she fell into endless demands and venting.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
